description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

COURSE DESCRIPTION

This course aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication competence through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

COURSE MATERIAL

Reading A-Z and supplementary materials by the instructor

Multicultural Fair (GROUP PROJECT)

*   Presenters (4 people in one group)

Before the fair, you have to …

1.  decide the topic of your fair
2.  find an article that introduces related topics (less than 200 words),
3.  design a handout/flyer based on the article.

During the fair, you have to divide the group into two pairs.

Pair 1

Pair 2

8:20-9:00

introduce

travel and explore

9:00-9:40

travel and explore

   When it’s your turn to introduce the culture, greet, explain and give out the flyers.

   When it’s your turn to travel and explore, listen, ask questions, and collect the flyers.

After the fair, you have to…

1.  pick two flyers to read, and
2.  share your thoughts in class on 10/26 and 12/21.
